item.title: Finally More Skiing
item.description: After an unfortunate number of weeks we got out for more skiing at Copper Mountain. Tiring with many runs, but felt great to be back out again.

item.title: Hanging Out
item.description: Hung out with my friend Elijah. Lots of talk about games; hatching plans to create some of our own.

item.title: Frustrations
item.description: Early meeting about auditing, leaving me no time to get Turtle to doggy daycare. Turtle was an asshole all day, compounding work frustrations.

item.title: Meetings and Breakings
item.description: Lots of meetings today, but good discussions all around, particularly the back-end discussion and coordinating with Lukan. Later went through breaks in taekwondo, where Oscar started things off strong and I crushed all of my adult boards and my simulated brick.

item.title: First Day Back
item.description: First day back from a vacation, even a short one, is always a challenge, with meetings, chasing information for my team, replying to emails and messages. Relaxing with Olympics.

item.title: Driving Home
item.description: Long drive home today. Windy, tiring, herds of tumbleweeds and clouds of blown dirt.

item.title: Seeing Mom
item.description: Went to see mom today with flowers, crystal clear blue sky, and sadness. Lunch at Macâ€™s with Angy and Dad, followed by laziness and memories.
